title: How to take Screenshot in Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro
author: Rishit Patel
description: Many users are searching the option to take Screenshot in Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro. So here are some really simple methods on the same.

content.content: A series of flagship smartphones Xiaomi Redmi Note has received many accolades. Redmi Note 3 Pro is a powerful pocket-friendly flagship smartphone featuring the presence of a fingerprint scanner, a battery of 4000mAh and decent 1.8 GHz ARM Cortex-A72. Quick, lightweight, beautiful, durable. Redmi Note 3 Pro will surely please you. All-in-all Redmi Note 3 Pro is a power packed smartphone and because of this, it's very popular smartphone. So, to make its use easy here is a guide on how to take screenshot in Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro.
How to take screenshot in Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro using the hardware keys

Taking a screenshot using hardware keys is the most common way of capturing screenshot on any Android smartphone which works on Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro well. Here is the step by step guide on how to take screenshot on Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 Pro using the hardware keys.

items: Go to the screen on which you want to take the screenshot.
Press and hold volume down and power button simultaneously for a couple of seconds.
The screenshot will be automatically saved in your phone's Gallery.
